typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	RaPipelineIdParam as string ('not-set')
}
source(output(
		flag as string,
		measurements_0 as string,
		measurements_1 as string,
		measurements_2 as string,
		measurements_3 as string,
		measurements_4 as string,
		measurements_5 as string,
		measurements_6 as string,
		measurements_7 as string,
		measurements_8 as string,
		measurements_9 as string,
		measurements_10 as string,
		measurements_11 as string,
		measurements_12 as string,
		measurements_13 as string,
		measurements_14 as string,
		measurements_15 as string,
		measurements_16 as string,
		measurements_17 as string,
		octaves_0 as string,
		octaves_1 as string,
		octaves_2 as string,
		octaves_3 as string,
		octaves_4 as string,
		octaves_5 as string,
		octaves_6 as string,
		octaves_7 as string,
		octaves_8 as string,
		octaves_9 as string,
		octaves_10 as string,
		octaves_11 as string,
		octaves_12 as string,
		octaves_13 as string,
		octaves_14 as string,
		octaves_15 as string,
		octaves_16 as string,
		octaves_17 as string,
		octaves_18 as string,
		octaves_19 as string,
		octaves_20 as string,
		octaves_21 as string,
		octaves_22 as string,
		octaves_23 as string,
		octaves_24 as string,
		octaves_25 as string,
		octaves_26 as string,
		octaves_27 as string,
		octaves_28 as string,
		octaves_29 as string,
		octaves_30 as string,
		octaves_31 as string,
		octaves_32 as string,
		octaves_33 as string,
		e_compass_correction as string,
		direction_xy as string,
		energy_xy as string,
		direction_z as string,
		energy_z as string,
		energy_dist_xy_0 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_1 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_2 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_3 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_4 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_5 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_6 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_7 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_8 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_9 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_10 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_11 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_12 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_13 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_14 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_15 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_16 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_17 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_18 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_19 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_20 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_21 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_22 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_23 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_24 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_25 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_26 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_27 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_28 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_29 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_30 as string,
		energy_dist_xy_31 as string,
		energy_dist_z_0 as string,
		energy_dist_z_1 as string,
		energy_dist_z_2 as string,
		energy_dist_z_3 as string,
		energy_dist_z_4 as string,
		energy_dist_z_5 as string,
		energy_dist_z_6 as string,
		energy_dist_z_7 as string,
		energy_dist_z_8 as string,
		energy_dist_z_9 as string,
		energy_dist_z_10 as string,
		energy_dist_z_11 as string,
		energy_dist_z_12 as string,
		energy_dist_z_13 as string,
		energy_dist_z_14 as string,
		energy_dist_z_15 as string,
		energy_dist_z_16 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'NmsFile',
	wildcardPaths:['*_records.csv']) ~> sourceNmsFiles
sourceNmsFiles derive(RowNumber = 1,
		RaPipelineId = $RaPipelineIdParam,
		NmsDocumentType = 'records') ~> AddDerivedCols
AddDerivedCols keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SetRowNumber
SetRowNumber sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/RaPipelineId'],
	throughput: 1,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkRadb
